definitions.definition: Impermeable to air or other gases .
Having no weak points or flaws .
examples: We have an airtight argument they wonâ€™t be able to punch holes in.

definitions.definition: Highly reserved in some matter, particularly tight-lipped or tight-fisted .
Triply penetrated simultaneously in the vagina , anus and mouth .

main_definition: Impermeable to air or other gases .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Having no weak points or flaws .
( figuratively , of a person ) Highly reserved in some matter, particularly tight-lipped or tight-fisted .
